item.title: MiniMax
item.description: Building AGI with our mission Intelligence with Everyone. Global leader in multi-modal models and AI-native products with over 200 million users.

item.title: MiniMax Agent，最大的智慧是“靠谱”
item.description: Try Now

item.title: MiniMax MCP Server 上线：多模态能力，一键触达
item.description: MiniMax MCP Server开源上线！简单文本输入调用视频图像语音生成及声音克隆。兼容Claude Desktop、Cursor、Windsurf、OpenAI Agents。支持npm/pnpm/uv安装，stdio/sse传输方式。

item.title: Hailuo Video Agent，Vibe Videoing 零门槛，成片直出
item.description: Hailuo Video Agent第一阶段开放！专业视频创意Agent模版，文字或图片输入一键生成高质量创意短片。三阶段打造端到端视频Agent，让视频创意生成更普惠，开启Vibe Videoing新时代。

item.title: MiniMax
item.link: https://www.minimax.io/news/%5Bdetail%5D/Voice cloning services are only available after completing individual or enterprise real-name verification. Once verified, you can access the feature through API Debugging Suite → Voice Cloning.
item.description: Building AGI with our mission Intelligence with Everyone. Global leader in multi-modal models and AI-native products with over 200 million users.
item.guid: https://www.minimax.io/news/%5Bdetail%5D/Voice cloning services are only available after completing individual or enterprise real-name verification. Once verified, you can access the feature through API Debugging Suite → Voice Cloning.

item.title: MiniMax

item.title: MiniMax
item.link: https://www.minimax.io/news/%5Bdetail%5D/The invoice title must match the name used in real-name authentication. Individual accounts cannot request invoices with a company name. To do so, please upgrade to enterprise authentication.
item.description: Building AGI with our mission Intelligence with Everyone. Global leader in multi-modal models and AI-native products with over 200 million users.
item.guid: https://www.minimax.io/news/%5Bdetail%5D/The invoice title must match the name used in real-name authentication. Individual accounts cannot request invoices with a company name. To do so, please upgrade to enterprise authentication.

item.title: MiniMax
item.link: https://www.minimax.io/news/%5Bdetail%5D/MiniMax API Platform currently supports two types of top-up methods: online payment and offline bank transfer. Go to Account → Balance and click the Top-up button to proceed.
item.description: Building AGI with our mission Intelligence with Everyone. Global leader in multi-modal models and AI-native products with over 200 million users.
item.guid: https://www.minimax.io/news/%5Bdetail%5D/MiniMax API Platform currently supports two types of top-up methods: online payment and offline bank transfer. Go to Account → Balance and click the Top-up button to proceed.
